name: Love And War
description:
Control - 

- Requires at least 2 players - Caters for up to 4 players.
- Controller support only - Mappings based on Xbox controllers
- Press X to fire. 
- Press Right Trigger to accelerate
- Press Left Trigger to decelerate/reverse
- Press Start when prompted
- Press options/select to skip certain countdown screens. 

The target of the game is the first person to collect 10 hearts. 

Players will drop hearts when destroyed. 

The first area you're placed is a lobby area for people to get used to controls and this can be skipped when at least two players are present. 
Press start on ALL gamepads you want to join before moving to the main arena.
